johnny
Class JohnnyCard

java.lang.Object
  johnny.JohnnyCard

public class JohnnyCard
extends java.lang.Object

The Johnny Card is a digital cash card is a digital cash card which uses flash filesystem to store virtual cash for connectionless point-of-sale transactions.

Author:
Alan Cooke, Liam McManus

Field Summary

          The number of transacations that are recorded in the history.

          Maximum balance a JohnnyCard can be allocated.

Constructor Detail

JohnnyCard

public JohnnyCard(int bankAccNo,
                  int cardId)
Constructor builds an instance of the JohnnyCard. The card is created with a balance of zero and no transaction history

Parameters:
bankAccNo - ID of the bank which this card is associated with
cardId - ID of the newly created card
Method Detail

getCash

public final int getCash()
Get the amount of cash available on the JohnnyCard.

Returns:
How much cash is on this card

Get a list of the last five transactions.

Returns:
What are the last five transactions that this card was involved in.

update

public final void update(int amount)
Change the amount of cash on this card by this much.

Parameters:
amount - the amount to be added/removed to/from the Johnny Card

lock

public final void lock()
Lock this card.

unlock

public final void unlock()
Unlock this card, requires the card to be locked before state is change.
